name: PKInkReference
desc: Provides a description of the creation and rendering of marks on a canvas.

items.name: init(inkType: __PKInkType, color: UIColor)
items.desc: Create a new ink, specifying its type, color.

items.name: var color: UIColor
items.desc: The base color for this ink.

items.name: var inkType: __PKInkType
items.desc: The type of ink, such as pen or pencil, as defined in the PKInkType enumeration.
